property.name: insertAttributeValueQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.categorical_attributes_values ( attribute_id, key, value) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes WHERE name=:KEY), :KEY, :VALUE) ON CONFLICT (key, value) DO NOTHING

property.name: loadAllAttributesValuesWithoutLinksQuery
property.value: SELECT attributes.name as key, attributes_values.value, attributes_values.id, attributes_values.attribute_id, attributes.owner, attributes.created_date FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes attributes LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values attributes_values on attributes.id = attributes_values.attribute_id

property.name: loadAllAttributesValuesQuery
property.value: SELECT attributes.name as key, attributes_values.value, attributes_values.id, attributes_values.attribute_id, attributes.owner, attributes.created_date, links.child_id, links.autofill, links_values.key child_key, links_values.value as child_value, links_values.attribute_id as child_attribute_id FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes attributes LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values attributes_values on attributes.id = attributes_values.attribute_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links links on attributes_values.id=links.parent_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values links_values on links_values.id = links.child_id

property.name: loadAttributeValuesQuery
property.value: SELECT attributes.name as key, attributes_values.value, attributes_values.id, attributes_values.attribute_id, attributes.owner, attributes.created_date, links.child_id, links.autofill, links_values.key child_key, links_values.value as child_value, links_values.attribute_id as child_attribute_id FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes attributes LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values attributes_values on attributes.id = attributes_values.attribute_id LEFT OUTER JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links links on attributes_values.id=links.parent_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values links_values on links_values.id = links.child_id WHERE attributes_values.key=:KEY

property.name: loadAttributeValuesByAttributeIdQuery
property.value: SELECT attributes.name as key, attributes_values.value, attributes_values.id, attributes_values.attribute_id, attributes.owner, attributes.created_date, links.child_id, links.autofill, links_values.key child_key, links_values.value as child_value, links_values.attribute_id as child_attribute_id FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes attributes LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values attributes_values on attributes.id = attributes_values.attribute_id LEFT OUTER JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links links on attributes_values.id=links.parent_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values links_values on links_values.id = links.child_id WHERE attributes_values.attribute_id=:ATTRIBUTE_ID

property.name: loadAttributesValuesQuery
property.value: SELECT attributes.name as key, attributes_values.value, attributes_values.id, attributes_values.attribute_id, attributes.owner, attributes.created_date, links.child_id, links.autofill, links_values.key child_key, links_values.value as child_value, links_values.attribute_id as child_attribute_id FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes attributes LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values attributes_values on attributes.id = attributes_values.attribute_id LEFT OUTER JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links links on attributes_values.id=links.parent_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.categorical_attributes_values links_values on links_values.id = links.child_id WHERE attributes_values.key IN (:list)

property.name: deleteAttributeValuesQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes WHERE name IN (:list)

property.name: deleteAttributeValueQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes_values WHERE key=:KEY AND value=:VALUE

property.name: insertAttributeValueLinkQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links ( parent_id, child_id, autofill) VALUES ( :PARENT_ID, :CHILD_ID, :AUTOFILL) ON CONFLICT (parent_id, child_id) DO UPDATE SET autofill=:AUTOFILL

property.name: deleteAttributeValueLinkQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.categorical_attributes_values_links WHERE parent_id=:PARENT_ID AND child_id=:CHILD_ID

property.name: updateAttributeOwnerQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.categorical_attributes SET owner = :OWNER WHERE id = :ATTRIBUTE_ID
